recital.text: Concurrently with the entry into this Agreement, the Partnership, Riverwalk Logistics, L.P., NuStar GP, LLC, Parent, Sunoco Merger Sub, LLC, and Sunoco GP LLC are entering into an Agreement and Plan of Merger, pursuant to which Parent will acquire the Partnership by means of a merger of Merger Sub with and into the Partnership.
ET wholly owns the Parent GP, beneficially owns all of the issued and outstanding Parent Incentive Distribution Rights, and beneficially owns 28,463,967 Parent Common Units.

The Partnership, Parent, and ET are entering into this Agreement setting forth certain representations, warranties, covenants, agreements, and other matters in connection with the transactions contemplated by the Merger Agreement.
ET and Parent acknowledge that the Partnership and its general partners are entering into the Merger Agreement in reliance on the representations and agreements of ET contained in this Agreement.

section.title: Term
section.text: This Agreement shall automatically terminate as of the earliest of the Effective Time, the termination of the Merger Agreement, the written agreement of the parties to terminate this Agreement, and April 22, 2025.

subsection.text: ET is a duly organized, validly existing limited partnership in good standing under its jurisdiction; it has the requisite authority to enter into this Agreement.
The information provided by ET for inclusion in regulatory filings will not contain untrue statements of material facts.
ET owns all issued and outstanding interests in Parent GP, Parent Common Units, and Parent Incentive Distribution Rights.
ET does not beneficially own any Partnership Common Units or Partnership Preferred Units outside its affiliates.
The execution and performance of the Merger Agreement does not conflict with ETâ€™s governing documents.
ET and affiliates have not employed any brokers or finders in connection with the transactions.

section.title: Certain Covenants and Agreements of ET, Parent, and the Partnership

subsection.text: ET shall increase the size of the Parent GP Board and appoint a New Parent Director before the Effective Time.
ET shall assist Parent and the Partnership in regulatory matters and efforts to obtain necessary approvals.
ET shall comply with non-solicitation provisions related to Parent.
ET shall furnish required information for regulatory filings upon request.
ET shall not transfer its interests in the Parent GP or Parent Common Units without consent.
ET shall not modify the Parent Incentive Distribution Rights without agreement.
ET shall not modify the Parent Organizational Documents without permission.
Provisions for post-termination liability and survival of certain terms are acknowledged.
No recourse against the ET Non-Recourse Parties under the Merger Agreement is acknowledged.
Publicity concerning the Merger must be coordinated among parties.
ET shall not interfere with the Merger Agreement compliance opportunities.
Parent shall not amend the Merger Agreement materially without ET's consent.

section.title: Disclosure
section.text: ET authorizes disclosure of its identity and ownership in relevant filings.

section.title: Amendment and Modification
section.text: Amendments require written consent from all parties.

section.title: Waiver
section.text: No individual waiver impacts other rights under the Agreement.

section.title: Notices
section.text: All notices must be in writing and delivered as specified in the Agreement.

address.details: Sunoco LP, 8111 Westchester Drive, Suite 400, Dallas, TX 75225
NuStar Energy L.P., 19003 IH-10 West, San Antonio, TX 78257
Energy Transfer LP, 8111 Westchester Drive, Suite 600, Dallas, TX 75225

section.title: Entire Agreement
section.text: This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement among the parties.

section.title: Section Headings
section.text: Headings are for convenience purposes only.

section.title: Assignment
section.text: No assignment without written consent; binding upon successors.

section.title: Governing Law
section.text: The Agreement is governed by the laws of the State of Delaware.

section.title: Jurisdiction; Specific Enforcement
section.text: Legal actions shall be exclusively brought in courts located in Delaware.
Parties waive any objection to personal jurisdiction.

section.title: WAIVER OF JURY TRIAL
section.text: Parties waive the right to trial by jury in any legal action related to this Agreement.

section.title: Severability
section.text: If any term is found invalid, the remaining terms remain effective.

section.title: Counterparts
section.text: This Agreement may be executed in counterparts.
